name: BUGGED (itch) (MangoWorks, HOKFMK)
description:
The story of this game is that your a spider in a computer and the user installed a free anti-virus that is malwares that creates evil ants that come out of the computer code (acid that the spider cant be in) and try to kill the spider. The spider was a .png image the user made 5 years ago and now its time for him to save the day.



Tutorail:
1. The colored tiles you special abilities when on them
2. There a tutorail in the game so yah just click the tutorail button and there's the rest. 


Credits:
MangoWorks - Programmer
Hokfmk - Artist
MarMar - Sound Designer
SSGuillio - Voice ActorThis game was made for Ludam Dare 52 and Mini Jam 123: Web
